Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at info@liftapp.by

This is a minor update with bug fixes and performance improvements, so we just wanted to use this space to wish you a glorious day, and send lots of love!
It would be really awesome if you rate us 5 stars! Also, feel free to share all your ideas and questions with us at support@appsyoulove.com. Your feedback is always helpful!
